description: Updates the name or associated model for a Provisioned Throughput. For more information, see Provisioned Throughput in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide.

parameters.name: provisionedModelId
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or name of the Provisioned Throughput to update.

parameters.name: desiredModelId
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the new model to associate with this Provisioned Throughput. You can't specify this field if this Provisioned Throughput is associated with a base model. If this Provisioned Throughput is associated with a custom model, you can specify one of the following options: The base model from which the custom model was customized. Another custom model that was customized from the same base model as the custom model.
